byline.original: By MICHAEL SCHWIRTZ and MICHAEL WINERIP

abstract: Office of United States Atty Preet Bharara will join investigation by Dutchess County district attorney's office into death of Samuel Harrell, prisoner at Fishkill Correctional Facility in Beacon, NY; will look into claims by 19 inmate witnesses that Harrell had been beaten severely by guards.
lead_paragraph: The United States attorney in Manhattan will investigate the death of Samuel Harrell, a prisoner at the Fishkill Correctional Facility who inmates say was beaten severely by guards.

headline.main: U.S. to Join Inquiry Into Death of New York Prisoner
headline.print_headline: U.S. to Join Investigation Into the Death of a Prisoner

snippet: The United States attorney in Manhattan will investigate the death of Samuel Harrell, a prisoner at the Fishkill Correctional Facility who inmates say was beaten severely by guards.
